code-runner.executorMap.python: test -f input.txt && cat input.txt | python -u $fileName || python -u $fileName
code-runner.executorMap.julia: test -f input.txt && cat input.txt | julia $fileName || julia $fileName
code-runner.executorMap.crystal: test -f input.txt && crystal run --no-color $fileName -- input.txt || crystal run --no-color $fileName
